item.title: Boosting Mental Health services in India
item.description: I attended a lecture on CBT- Cognitive Behavioural Therapy and how it is being made accessible in Scotland. Check the website below. http://www.livinglifetothefull.com/index.php?section=page&page_seq=13 Can we bring this to India?
